mapper.select: select trvl_id, trvl_name, trvl_start_dt, trvl_end_dt, tb1.cntry_id, tb1.city_id, img_url, cmpn_cnt, trvl_pd, total_pay_amt, cmpn_type, trvl_main_fctr, clstr_label, use_yn, budget_amt, total_room_rate, total_trff_rate, total_act_rate, total_etc_rate, tb1.cntry_name, tb1.city_name, usr_info.user_name from trvl_info join (select ctr.cntry_id, ctr.cntry_name, ct.city_id, ct.city_name from cntry_info ctr join city_info ct on ctr.cntry_id = ct.cntry_id) as tb1 on trvl_info.cntry_id = tb1.cntry_id and trvl_info.city_id = tb1.city_id join usr_info on trvl_info.user_id = usr_info.user_id order by trvl_id desc limit 0, 5;

mapper.select: select city_id, (select city_name from city_info where city_id = #{cityId}) as city_name, (select img_url from city_info where city_id = #{cityId}) as img_url, cntry_id, (select cntry_name from cntry_info where cntry_id = #{cntryId}) as cntry_name, round(avg(ti.total_pay_amt) * avg(total_room_rate),0) + round(avg(ti.total_pay_amt) * avg(total_food_rate),0) + round(avg(ti.total_pay_amt) * avg(total_trff_rate),0) + round(avg(ti.total_pay_amt) * avg(total_act_rate),0) + round(avg(ti.total_pay_amt) * avg(total_etc_rate),0) as avgTotalPayAmt, avg(total_room_rate) as avgRoomRate, avg(total_food_rate) as avgFoodRate, avg(total_trff_rate) as avgTrffRate, avg(total_act_rate) as avgActRate, avg(total_etc_rate) as avgEtcRate, round(avg(ti.total_pay_amt) * avg(total_room_rate),0) as avgRoomAmt, round(avg(ti.total_pay_amt) * avg(total_food_rate),0) as avgFoodAmt, round(avg(ti.total_pay_amt) * avg(total_trff_rate),0) as avgTrffAmt, round(avg(ti.total_pay_amt) * avg(total_act_rate),0) as avgActAmt, round(avg(ti.total_pay_amt) * avg(total_etc_rate),0) as avgEtcAmt, clstr_label from trvl_info ti where clstr_label=#{clstrLabel} and cntry_id=#{cntryId} and city_id=#{cityId}

select trvl_id, trvl_name, trvl_start_dt, trvl_end_dt, (select city_name from city_info where city_id=#{cityId}) as city_name, (select img_url from city_info where city_id=#{cityId}) as img_url, (select cntry_name from cntry_info where cntry_id=#{cntryId}) as cntry_name, cmpn_type, cmpn_cnt from trvl_info where clstr_label=#{clstrLabel} and cntry_id=#{cntryId} and city_id=#{cityId}

select trvl_id, tb1.city_name, tb1.cntry_name, trvl_start_dt, trvl_end_dt, img_url, total_pay_amt, case when now() between trvl_start_dt and trvl_end_dt then 0 else 1 end as rnk from trvl_info join (select ctr.cntry_id, ctr.cntry_name, ct.city_id, ct.city_name from cntry_info ctr join city_info ct on ctr.cntry_id = ct.cntry_id) as tb1 on trvl_info.cntry_id = tb1.cntry_id and trvl_info.city_id = tb1.city_id where user_id=#{userId} order by rnk asc, trvl_end_dt desc
